pkgmetadata.longdescription: SnapPy======SnapPy is a package for studying the topology and geometry of3-manifolds, with a focus on hyperbolic structures. It is based onthe SnapPea kernel written by `Jeff Weeks<http://www.geometrygames.org>`_. Complete documentation is available on the web including the `mainpage <http://snappy.computop.org>`_ and an `installation guide<http://snappy.computop.org/installing.html>`_. You can also browsethe `source code <https://github.com/3-manifolds/SnapPy>`_.
